channel.title: Spec recharge rate and bonus screen update?
channel.description: so im on a 317 and need to know how to change my spec recharge rate, and also when Im on my equipment bonus screen, When I wield an item it automatically closes, and when it doesnt close the bonuses dont update when you wield a different weapon, please help, thanks ;)
